courses.courseDescription: Build websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Learn about common data structures and algorithms

assessments.assessmentDescription: This assessment covers Ruby on Rails, a server-side web application framework. Test your skills in MVC architecture, routing, and more.

questions.text: Which design pattern does Ruby on Rails use?
Rails is a server-side web application framework written in Ruby.
Which command is used to generate a new Rails application?
Which file is used to configure the database in a Rails application?
Rails uses Active Record as its ORM.
Which command is used to start the Rails server?
What is the default web server for Rails?
Rails supports RESTful architecture.
What is the command to generate a new controller in Rails?
Which of the following is a valid Ruby on Rails callback?

assessments.assessmentDescription: This assessment covers Angular, a front-end web application framework. Test your skills in TypeScript, components, and more.

questions.text: Angular is a framework for building client applications in:
Angular components are the basic building blocks of Angular applications.
Which directive is used to bind the application state to the view in Angular?
Which lifecycle hook is called after Angular has initialized all data-bound properties?
Angular applications are structured as a tree of modules, components, and services.
Which service is used to make HTTP requests in Angular?
What is the command to create a new Angular project?
Angular uses the RxJS library for reactive programming.
Which decorator is used to define a component in Angular?
Which file is the entry point for an Angular application?

assessments.assessmentDescription: This assessment covers React, a front-end web application framework. Test your skills in JSX, components, and more.

questions.text: In React, what is used to pass data to a component from outside?
JSX stands for JavaScript XML.
Which method is used to handle state in a functional component?
React components can be defined as classes or functions.
Which lifecycle method is invoked immediately after a component is mounted?
React uses a virtual DOM to improve performance.
Which command is used to create a new React app?
State in React can be updated using the setState method in class components.
Which hook is used to perform side effects in functional components?
Which tool is used to take a snapshot of the DOM tree in React?

assessments.assessmentDescription: This assessment covers Node.js, a server-side JavaScript runtime. Test your skills in asynchronous programming, Express.js, and more.

questions.text: Node.js is built on which JavaScript engine?
Node.js is single-threaded.
Which module in Node.js is used for handling file system operations?
Which of the following is a core module in Node.js?
Node.js supports non-blocking I/O operations.
Which command is used to install a package globally in Node.js?
Which module is used to create a web server in Node.js?
Node.js can be used for both frontend and backend development.
Which method is used to read the contents of a file in Node.js?
Which of the following is a popular framework for Node.js?

assessments.assessmentDescription: This assessment covers Python, a versatile programming language. Test your skills in data types, control structures, and more.

questions.text: Which of the following is a mutable data type in Python?
Python supports both procedural and object-oriented programming.
Which keyword is used to create a function in Python?
Which of the following is used to define a block of code in Python?
Python is a dynamically-typed language.
Which method is used to add an element to the end of a list in Python?
Which of the following is not a built-in data type in Python?
Python uses indentation to define code blocks.
Which module in Python is used for regular expressions?
Which of the following is the correct file extension for Python files?

assessments.assessmentDescription: This assessment covers Java, a popular object-oriented programming language. Test your skills in OOP principles, Java syntax, and more.

questions.text: Which of the following is not a Java feature?
Java is a platform-independent language.
Which keyword is used to define a subclass in Java?
Which method is the entry point for a Java application?
Java supports multiple inheritance through interfaces.
Which of the following is not an access modifier in Java?
Which of the following is used to handle exceptions in Java?
Which of the following is not a valid keyword in Java?
Which of the following is used to create an object in Java?
Which of the following is the correct syntax to create an array in Java?

assessments.assessmentDescription: This assessment covers C#, a language used for developing Windows applications. Test your skills in .NET framework, OOP, and more.

questions.text: Which of the following is the correct syntax to declare a class in C#?
C# is a statically-typed language.
Which of the following is not a data type in C#?
Which method is used to read a line of text from the console in C#?
C# supports operator overloading.
Which keyword is used to inherit a class in C#?
Which of the following is used to handle exceptions in C#?
C# is part of the .NET framework.
Which of the following is the correct way to declare an array in C#?
Which method is used to start a thread in C#?

assessments.assessmentDescription: This assessment covers PHP, a server-side scripting language. Test your skills in web development, database interaction, and more.

questions.text: Which of the following is the correct way to start a PHP tag?
PHP scripts are executed on the client side.
Which function is used to include a file in PHP?
Which function is used to get the length of a string in PHP?
PHP stands for Hypertext Preprocessor.
Which of the following is not a valid PHP variable name?
Which function is used to open a file in PHP?
PHP supports both procedural and object-oriented programming.
Which of the following is used to connect to a MySQL database in PHP?
Which of the following is a superglobal array in PHP?

assessments.assessmentDescription: This assessment covers Swift, a language used for iOS and macOS development. Test your skills in Swift syntax, Xcode, and more.

questions.text: Which keyword is used to define a constant in Swift?
Swift is a type-safe language.
Which function is used to print output to the console in Swift?
Which of the following is the correct way to declare an optional in Swift?
Swift uses automatic reference counting (ARC) for memory management.
Which keyword is used to declare a structure in Swift?
Which of the following is used to handle errors in Swift?
Swift supports both classes and structures.
Which of the following is the correct way to declare an array in Swift?
Which of the following is used to define a method in a Swift class?

assessments.assessmentDescription: This assessment covers Kotlin, a language for Android development. Test your skills in Kotlin syntax, Android Studio, and more.

questions.text: Which keyword is used to define a function in Kotlin?
Kotlin is fully interoperable with Java.
Which extension is used for Kotlin files?
In Kotlin, which keyword is used to declare a mutable variable?
Kotlin supports both object-oriented and functional programming.
Which function is used to print output to the console in Kotlin?
Which keyword is used to create a class in Kotlin?
Which of the following is the correct way to define an extension function in Kotlin?
Kotlin is a statically-typed language.
Which of the following is used to handle null safety in Kotlin?

assessments.assessmentDescription: This assessment covers HTML & CSS, the building blocks of web development. Test your skills in web page structure, styling, and more.
This assessment covers JavaScript, a language for web development. Test your skills in ES6 features, DOM manipulation, and more.
This assessment covers SQL, a language for database management. Test your skills in querying, joins, and more.
This assessment covers TypeScript, a superset of JavaScript. Test your skills in static typing, interfaces, and more.
This assessment covers Go, a statically typed language. Test your skills in concurrency, Go syntax, and more.
This assessment covers Django, a high-level Python web framework. Test your skills in MVT architecture, ORM, and more.
This assessment covers Flask, a micro web framework for Python. Test your skills in routing, Jinja2 templates, and more.
This assessment covers Vue.js, a progressive JavaScript framework. Test your skills in Vue components, directives, and more.
This assessment covers ASP.NET, a framework for building web apps on the .NET platform. Test your skills in MVC, Razor, and more.
This assessment covers Spring, a framework for building Java applications. Test your skills in Spring Boot, dependency injection, and more.
This assessment covers Laravel, a PHP framework for web artisans. Test your skills in Eloquent ORM, Blade templating, and more.
This assessment covers Scala, a language for functional programming and strong static systems. Test your skills in Scala syntax, collections, and more.
This assessment covers Rust, a language empowering everyone to build reliable and efficient software. Test your skills in Rust syntax, ownership, and more.
This assessment covers Elixir, a dynamic, functional language designed for building scalable and maintainable applications. Test your skills in Elixir syntax, concurrency, and more.
This assessment covers Perl, a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over 30 years of development. Test your skills in Perl syntax, regex, and more.
This assessment covers Shell Scripting, a powerful tool for automating tasks in Unix-based systems. Test your skills in Bash syntax, scripting, and more.
This assessment covers MATLAB, a high-level language and interactive environment for numerical computation, visualization, and programming. Test your skills in MATLAB syntax, functions, and more.
